choices: To the other side of the park
1.content:
Its been half of a year since Timothy has left his home and for an ant-size boy like him it wasn't like he just got up and left. He was swept up by the strong wind that happened that faithful. Luckily for him, he was used to be a speck in his home and having to survive not getting stepped on or eaten by his family so his survival skills are quite handy for himself. On this journey of his he learned a couple of new things about himself. Hes able to withstand a huge amount of pressure and being attacked by predators of the insect world. Which to him it means he is indestructible and another fun fact he learned he can understand all insects making him never lonely in this gigantic world.

For the past months, he has been living within the tall grass within a far section of the city's park that has been neglected by the park ranger and the citizens of the city allowing the bugs to fully take over. From the bugs, he learned new survival skills them. Yet due to his sense for adventure, he longs for more so that on that day he decided to venture on.

Timothy hops onto a nearby fly and asks it for a ride. The fly at first refused by soon gave in as it flew off to the distant allowing Timothy the adventure he has always wanted.

Where did they go?
1.title: The Start of it all

choices: The Hair of the Young Boy
In Between the bulging pecs of the father
Ontop of a hot dog being handed to the sweaty jogger
In the Tray of the Formal Man
11.content:
A few moments go by as Timothy looks around and smiles as he looks at all the people in the park. As the fly soars around Timothy notices a couple of people sticking around. A young boy playing in the playground, a tall hairy muscular man with a beard in a loose white t-shirt with a navy blue button-up striped shirt telling the same boy in the playground that they are leaving soon. In a bench nearby is a very formal looking man eating food from a tray he got from the food truck. Lastly is a sweaty muscular man wearing skin-tight clothing ordering a hot dog from the hot dog stand.

Just then a large blue jay is flying right behind Timothy and The Fly that when the fly finally reacted it managed to knock Timothy right off of it. "Oh god, I knew shouldn't be staring at the other people" spoke Timothy under his breath as he looks where he is heading.
11.title: To the other side of the park

choices: Irrelevant; Tim's grip slips and he falls down towards the father's lower body
112.content:
Timothy hurtled through the air and saw he was heading straight for the father of the boy. He was in his mid-30s, very tall, masculine, with a great beard and, clearly, bulging pecs that Timothy crashed right into. Tim yelled out in pain as he hit the chest of this giant man, but was able to prevent himself falling for now by grabbing onto the massive tree-sized strand of the chest hair. As the father walks with his son back to the car his pecs began to bounce with each step as Timothy holds on with all his strength.

But had the handsome, bear-like father noticed the impact on his chest?
112.title: The bulging pecs of the father

choices: Towards the two handsome guys, potentially gay
Towards the outdoor gym, full of jocks working out in the sun
Towards the ice-cream stand with the handsome vendor and a long line of people
Towards the sea! Time for a swim - and who knows what's under there!
12.content:
After a while of flying, Tim dozed off, but eventually he was woken up by the sound of a frisebee flying just overhead. He looked around and realised the fly had flown him all the way to the beach!

Tim shrugged, pretty excited by this development. His family had never let him go anywhere on his own, really, let alone the beach! He asked the fly to slow down a little and the fly acquiesced, slowing down just enough for him to get a good bead on what was going on. It was a busy day. There was an African-American family of 3 nearby; two sons, one an older teenager of maybe 18, a handsome father who didn't look much older than 40. Two Caucasian males lying very close to each other, both looking fairly masculine, one easily 6'4''; not displaying much outward affection but clearly together, but Tim guessed they might be gay; and some muscular hunky jock-types exercising at a small outdoor gym right next to the beach itself.

The fly, though, was headed for an ice-cream stand, which included a surprisingly handsome vendor, also Timothy's age, and a loooooong line of people of all sorts of backgrounds and with all sorts of different companions - friends, families, what looked like two members of a sports team given their matching outfits... so many different people he could drop in on. Timothy had a choice - where could he go? He could more or less go anywhere, see anyone - become an almost literal fly on the wall of ANYBODY'S life. It was a strange kind of power, especially for one so small.

So where was that power going to take Timothy today? The world was his oyster.
12.title: Beach

choices: to land somewhere on the father.
to land somewhere on the older son
land on their stuff + hitch a ride home with them, or go elsewhere (your choice)
121.content:
The family was handsome. The father, probably in his late 30s, was bald with a goatee and very tall. His son, 18, was slightly shorter but it was a matter of a few centimetres. Both easily exceeded 6 foot. The little brother, who Tim guessed was about 12, was playing in the seat, while the two adults were talking. It seemed to be an animated discussion.

Timothy decided...
121.title: Towards the African American family

1212.content: Timothy felt a massive attraction for the eldest son. Maybe it was the bulging pecs and how it shines in the summer sun or the charming deep voice of the son that soooth the mightest of beasts. He learned a couple things from listening. The eldest son is Jaquan and he’s a college student studying to be a businessman. With no further a due Timothy leaps off the fly landing with a gentle thud he starts planning his first ever adventure on this amazing muscular titanic god
1212.title: to land somewhere on the older son

12121.content:
Jacquan's hair was thick, close-cropped and curly so it was easy to get a handhold once inside. It would also be harder to see, or feel, Timothy if he stared there. He landed in the forest of hair and stared out. He practically had the same point of view as the giant himself now and stared out at the handsome father ahead of him, talking to the giant about college. Jacquan's booming voice came from below. "The basketball team WANT me, Dad. It's not just me giving up my studies. They WANT me on the team. That's a big deal!"
"Your degree is a bigger deal," came the dad's baritone voice. "Just make sure you stay focussed on that."
You could almost FEEL Jacquan rolling his eyes beneath you. "Yes sir," he said with a note of resentment in his voice.
"Good. Anyway, let's..."
12121.title: Into Jacquan’s short curly hair

13.content:
Tumothy had laid back to relax letting the fly take control but once he heard the bustling sounds of the the big streets he instantly got up and looked around. When he was young Timothy was raised far away frok the big city but now that his whole life is finally in his own full control he looks around to see where he should begin.

There's many venues and stores and even apartments in this city he can literally to anywhere he want and thanks to his puny size he won't get caught.
He looks around and wonders what to do next.
13.title: Streets

info.brief_description: A Tiny Human in a realm filled of giants tries to survive his life while also having fun
info.description:
This story is about the adventure of a miniature 18 year old boy who is the size of a mere ant. He was born in this way and had always lived with his family but one day he got a bit too careless and ended up being whisk away by the strong wind and taken on an adventure he never would've predicted.

now ofc as this is my first story ima lay down some ground rules
1- No female interactions and I will for sure will delete
2- keep the sexual interactions at a minimal they can still happen just don't be too detailed
3- no toilet fetishes
4- if possible keep Timothy unaware, if you want him to be spotted by a giant then go-ahead just add in an option to keep the unaware story going.
5- Timothy is immortal and can only die from old age
6-have fun
